definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="entity_xplevel"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="entity_lookpos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_lookpos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_lookpos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_xp"><value name="xpamount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">-40</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
